text: Michal Ondráček (born 8 June 1973) is a retired Czech football player who played in the Czech First League for FC Baník Ostrava and SK České Budějovice. He later played for clubs including MFK Karviná and FC Hlučín. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Czech footballers Category:Czech Republic under-21 international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Czech First League players Category:FC Baník Ostrava players Category:SK Dynamo České Budějovice players Category:MFK Karviná players Category:FC Hlučín players
title: Michal Ondráček
